query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS faceDescriptor TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS facePhotoUrl VARCHAR(512),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS faceRegisteredAt DATETIME;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2zjpxFGuGsCP7jR.root --database Vd5BJ8toX8cUC4zST6itFN --execute ALTER TABLE users
